Content

Introducing a modular data platform

Why SpaDES, what it is for, and how does it help us? Plus: importing modules and running fairly simple simulations from pre-made modules

  • Google Drive - Contains Powerpoint, module code for LCC2005 example
  • What is SpaDES?

Getting started with SpaDES in R

How to start from the beginning, making simple modules, making modules interact

  • My first SpaDES module - from `R` to `SpaDES`
  • SpaDES4Dummies - Building new modules, and connecting them
  • Converting R code to a `SpaDES` module - seed establishment

Using existing modules -- Developer's Workshop

If you are given a module, how do we get it, understand it, run it, test it, incorporate it into our own modules

  • Modules -- Downloading and using existing modules
  • Integrating different disciplines? With SpaDES is possible!

Developing a new continuously available science -- Developer's Workshop

Often decision support appears a long way from raw data collection, statistical model fitting, simulation modeling, optimization
